name: Androguard
description: A powerful tool for reverse engineering Android apps.

name: Angr
description: A binary analysis framework for symbolic execution, taint analysis, and more.

name: Apk2Gold
description: A tool for decompiling APK files into Java source code.

name: ApktTool
description: A tool for reverse engineering Android APK files.

name: Barf
description: A binary analysis and reverse engineering framework.

name: BinUtils
description: A collection of binary utilities for Linux and other operating systems.

name: Binwalk
description: A tool for analyzing, reverse engineering, and extracting firmware images.

name: Boomerang
description: An open source, reverse engineering framework for decompiling and disassembling binary code.

name: CWE Checker
description: A tool for detecting vulnerabilities in C and C++ code using the Common Weakness Enumeration.

name: Frida
description: A dynamic instrumentation toolkit for developers, reverse-engineers, and security researchers.

name: GDB
description: A powerful command-line debugger for C, C++, and other languages.

name: Jadx
description: A decompiler for Android apps that can be used to recover Java source code from APK files.

name: Triton
description: A dynamic binary analysis (DBA) framework that can be used to analyze and instrument binaries on-the-fly.

name: Ghidra
description: A software reverse engineering (SRE) suite of tools developed by the NSA.

name: Radare2
description: A portable reverse engineering framework that can disassemble, decompile, debug, and patch binaries.

name: IDA Pro
description: A popular and powerful interactive disassembler and debugger.

name: x86 Dbg
description: A lightweight, open-source debugger for Windows that supports x86 architecture.

name: x64 Dbg
description: A powerful, open-source debugger for Windows that supports x64 architecture.

name: OllyDbg
description: A popular debugger for Windows that allows you to analyze binary code and find vulnerabilities.

name: Iaito
description: A modern debugging tool for Windows that offers various features like dynamic analysis, code coverage, and more.

name: Binary Ninja
description: A powerful and modern binary analysis platform that supports multiple architectures and has a user-friendly interface.

name: Cutter
description: A free and open-source reverse engineering platform that is based on the Ghidra disassembler and has a modern user interface.

name: Pwntools
description: A CTF framework and exploit development library that allows you to write exploit code in Python.
